lead_paragraph: Mini USA will feature in Super Bowl ads six celebrities who have some history with the brand associated only with small cars, talking about defying the labels others have placed on them.
snippet: Mini USA will feature in Super Bowl ads six celebrities who have some history with the brand associated only with small cars, talking about defying the labels others have placed on them.

headline.main: Mini Brand Fits Celebrities Into Super Bowl Ads
headline.print_headline: Mini Brand Fits Celebrities Into Super Bowl Ads

abstract: Mini USA has prepared 30-second Super Bowl commercial that features six celebrities with direct connections to brand; stars are Serena Williams, Abby Wambach, T-Pain, Randy Johnson, Tony Hawk and Harvey Keitel.
